alert.note: Alert for Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 2:59PM MST until February 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected. Snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches possible below 5000 feet. 5 to 9 inches is possible above 5000 ft. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph this evening. * WHERE...Northwest Plateau including Colorado City. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be impacted from slick or snow covered roadways across the Arizona Strip due to accumulating snowfall.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
